pages.text: "Any technology advanced enough is indistinguishable from magic," you once heard.$(br)You're still not entirely sure how this storage system manages to store so many blocks in such a small space, but since you regularly walk around with hundreds of square metres of dirt, you've never bothered to question it.

pages.title: Growth Acceleration
pages.text: Looks like - despite the name - the $(item)Crystal Growth Accelerator$() can grow more than just quartz! It can also grow other types of gemstones.

pages.title: Quartz Auto-Harvesting
pages.text: The $(l:magic/crystal_apothecary)Crystal Apothecary$() not only harvests $(item)Gemstone Buds$(), but also $(item)Certus Quartz$().

pages.title: Moving Budding Quartz
pages.text: Tools enchanted with $(l:enchantments/resonance)Resonance$() are able to harvest $(item)Budding Quartz$(), while retaining their $(italic)flawless$() state.

pages.title: Anvil Crushing
pages.text: Many of AE2's items can be $(l:general/anvil_crushing)crushed to dust with an anvil$/l): $(item)Certus Quartz$(), $(item)Fluix$(), $(item)Skystone$() and $(item)Ender Pearls$().
In desperate need of $(item)Charged Certus Quartz$()? $(l:resources/storm_stone)Storm Stones$() will charge them up in a heartbeat.

pages.title: Certus Crushing
pages.text: ...and then create $(item)Fluix$() from it, if you get impatient.

pages.title: Certus Charging
pages.text: Being crystalline structures, $(item)Certus Quartz$() and $(item)Fluix Crystals$() can be grown in the Crystallarieum.
